alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 04 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sherman County through 800 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm centered a few miles northwest of Loup City, or 20 miles south of Ord, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loup City, Ashton and Sherman Reservoir Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
